thread.title: President Obama: 'We Will Never Be at War With Islam' - Fox Nation
thread.title_full: President Obama: 'We Will Never Be at War With Islam' - Fox Nation

title: President Obama: 'We Will Never Be at War With Islam' - Fox Nation
text:
President Obama: 'We Will Never Be at War With Islam' Published July 6, 2015 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 
BY POLLY MOSENDZ, Newsweek 
Updated | On Monday afternoon, President Obama spoke at the Pentagon about the Islamic State, or ISIS, a terrorist organization in Syria and Iraq. 
... 
"Ideologies are not defeated with guns, they are defeated by better ideas. We will never be at war with Islam," Obama added, stressing that ISIS distorts Islam.
